scripts.build: npm run build-core && npm run build-ui
scripts.build-core: cd packages/core && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build-ui: cd packages/ui && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.clean: npm run clean-core && npm run clean-ui
scripts.clean-core: cd packages/core && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean-ui: cd packages/ui && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.test-core: cd packages/core && npm run test && cd ../..
